timeline.message:
Color Jenkins logs support

Enables support for ANSI color codes in the logs. This is output
by many tools and should enhance readability.

Depends on https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/INFRA-20682

This should also fix codecov links that have ANSI color codes at the
end. https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEAM-10701

Color Jenkins logs support

Enables support for ANSI color codes in the logs. This is output
by many tools and should enhance readability.

Depends on https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/INFRA-20682

This should also fix codecov links that have ANSI color codes at the
end. https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEAM-10701

timeline.bodyText: For my education, where is this defined?
timeline.author: tvalentyn

replies.bodyText:
It's from the ansicolor plugin, which I recently asked Infra to install.
Technically, the Jenkins DSL plugin defines colorizeOutput.
replies.author: udim
